scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc assembly/index.ts -o build/untouched.wasm -t build/untouched.wat --use Math=JSMath --runtime stub --importMemory --sourceMap --debug --measure
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts -o build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --use Math=JSMath --runtime stub -O3 --importMemory --sourceMap --measure
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
